description.short: Bonus to hit with handguns. See page 50.
description.full: Up to 3 crew gain +1 hit with handguns.

description.short: Ignore being distracted. See page 50.
description.full: Ignore being distracted.

description.short: Hazard tokens aid smash attacks. See page 50.
description.full: When making a smash attack, gain +1 dice for each Hazard Token.

description.short: Give Hazard Tokens to opponents. See page 50.
description.full: When an opposing vehicle ends within short range, it gains a Hazard Token.

description.short: Damage with Hazard Tokens instead. See page 50.
description.full: Can add Hazard Tokens to smash targets instead of hull points.

description.short: Make piledriver attacks. See page 50.
description.full: Can make piledriver attacks, like a War Rig.

description.short: Explodes more easily and does more damage when exploding. See page 50.
description.full: Add +1 to explosion checks. Treat as one weights-class heavier when it explodes.

description.short: Do damage to remove Hazard Tokens. See page 50.
description.full: Remove a Hazard Token when causing 1+ hits

description.short: Transfer Hazard Tokens to friendly vehicles. See page 50.
description.full: Once per activation, may remove a Hazard Token and place it on a friendly vehicle within double range.

description.short: Take Hazard Tokens to reroll dice during a smash. See page 50.
description.full: Take a Hazard Token to reroll all dice during a smash.

description.short: May move a Hazard Token to another vehicle. See page 50.
description.full: At the end of activation, if has 4+ Hazard Tokens, may move a Hazard Token to a vehicle within medium range.

description.short: Gain Audience Votes for wiping out. See page 50.
description.full: If this vehicle wipes out, gain +1 Audience Vote.

description.short: Improved evade chance. See page 50.
description.full: Counts a 5+ as a success when evading.

description.short: May use different templates when sliding. See page 50.
description.full: May use any template except a long straight when sliding.

description.short: Smash attacks against this vehicle suffer a penalty. See page 50.
description.full: Smash attacks against this vehicle suffer -2 attack dice.

description.short: May count current gear as higher or lower when selecting a template. See page 50.
description.full: May count current gear as one higher or lower when selecting a template. Unpermitted manoeuvres counts as hazardous.

description.short: Gain Hazard Tokens to ignore obstructions. See page 50.
description.full: Gain 3 Hazard Tokens to ignore any obstructions.

description.short: May push it extra times. See page 50.
description.full: May push it any number of times.

description.short: When attacked, gain Hazard Tokens to also attack. See page 50.
description.full: Once per gear step, when attacked, gain +1 Hazard Token to also attack.

description.short: Some crew gain a hit bonus. See page 50.
description.full: Up to 3 crew gain +1 hit against targets within double range but not medium range.

description.short: Crew gains extra attack. See page 50.
description.full: Once per attack step, one crew may fire twice.

description.short: With shooting attacks, critical hit do extra damage. See page 50.
description.full: With shooting attacks, critical hit do 3 hits (not 2).

description.short: May assign multiple crew to a weapon to gain a bonus to hit. See page 50.
description.full: May assign 2 crew to a weapon to gain +1 bonus to hit.

description.short: When attacking with a weapon with extra ammo, gain extra dice. See page 50.
description.full: When attacking with a shooting weapon with 2+ ammo, gain +1 dice.

description.short: Ignore certain surfaces. See page 50.
description.full: Ignore rough and treacherous surfaces.

description.short: May change skid dice results. See page 50.
description.full: Once per game, after rolling skid dice, change the results.

description.short: May discard rolled skid dice. See page 50.
description.full: Once per turn, may discard one rolled skid dice.

description.short: No Hazard Token for shifting down gears. See page 50.
description.full: No Hazard Token for shifting down a gear.

description.short: Bonus handling. See page 50.
description.full: +1 handling.

description.short: Improved spin. See page 50.
description.full: When applying a spin result, may face any direction.

description.short: Start the game in higher gear. See page 50.
description.full: Roll a D6 at the start of the game. Start in that gear.

description.short: Gain shift results from vehicles in front. See page 50.
description.full: During a skid check, gain 1 shift result if there is a vehicle within short range in front.

description.short: Stick shift up after blast attack. See page 50.
description.full: On losing 1+ hull from a blast attack, may stick shift up.

description.short: Roll extra skid dice at the risk of Hazard Tokens. See page 51.
description.full: May roll an extra skid dice but if does not shift up, gains a Hazard Token.

description.short: After passing a gate, remove Hazard Tokens. See page 51.
description.full: After passing a gate, may remove any number of Hazard Tokens.

description.short: Can always choose a long straight. See page 51.
description.full: Can choose a long straight in any gear. It is never hazardous or trivial.

description.short: When flipped, choose template. See page 51.
description.full: When flipped, may choose the long straight, veer, or gentle templates.

description.short: Gain a random speed perk. See page 51.
description.full: At the start of each game, gain a random speed perk.

description.short: Gain a random precision perk. See page 51.
description.full: At the start of each game, gain a random precision perk.

description.short: A crewmember may repair hull. See page 51.
description.full: Once per turn, instead of attacking, a crewmember may repair 1 hull.

description.short: +2 max gear (up to 6). If fails a flip check, explodes. See page 51.
description.full: +2 max gear (up to 6). If fails a flip check, explodes. When explodes, counts as heavyweights.

description.short: Gain hazard tokens to attempt a teleport. See page 51.
description.full: Gain 3 hazard token and roll a skid dice. On a hazard, opponent places vehicle within long range, otherwise place vehicle within medium range.

description.short: Fewer hazards from collisions. See TX2, page 6.
Pivot around front edge during Spins. See TX2, page 6.
Ignore hazard icons on templates. See TX2, page 6.
Ignore excess hazards during skid checks. See TX2, page 6.
Prevent incoming collisions. See TX2, page 6.
Store spins and slides to reroll skid dice. See TX2, page 6.
